title: Start
body:
<<if $stepped_on_flowers eq 1>>
Gardener: Be careful! These flowers can be very fragile.
<<endif>>
Gardener: Hey girls! Can you help me? I'm trying to decide what to plant here. Zinnias, orchid, or blue ginger?
[[ Zinnias |exit]] 
[[ Orchid |exit]] 
[[ Blue Ginger |exit]]

title: exit
body: Gardener: Thank you! I think they'll look great.
